ComicInfo.Title: Grumpy Butt
ComicInfo.Series: Adventure Time: Marceline and the Scream Queens
ComicInfo.Summary: JOIN FAN-FAVORITES MARCELINE THE VAMPIRE QUEEN AND PRINCESS BUBBLEGUM FOR ROCK-FUELED EXCITEMENT IN THIS ADVENTURE TIME MINI-SERIES! Now that Princess Bubblegum is properly prepared to rock, it’s time to meet the band…the groovy ghoulish SCREAM QUEENS! Written and drawn by acclaimed cartoonist Meredith Gran (OCTOPUS PIE) and featuring a back-up story from Faith Erin Hicks, with variant covers by Yuko Ota (JOHNNY WANDER). ADVENTURE TIME #1 and #2 sold out before they hit stores! Don’t miss out!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:29:07. [CVDB349703]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jen Wang, Lisa Moore, Yuko Ota
ComicInfo.Characters: BMO, Bongo, Guy, Keila, Kevin, Marceline the Vampire Queen, Princess Bubblegum, Tree Trunks
